Package com.federicobenedetti.oop.Controllers

Class DataSetController

java.lang.Object
com.federicobenedetti.oop.Controllers.DataSetController
public class DataSetController
extends java.lang.Object
This controller will actually manage our dataset, and expose all the methods needed by the HttpRequests controller

    • GetMetaData

      public java.util.ArrayList<MetaDataDto> GetMetaData()
      Given that our dataset is partially static, i took the decision to hardcode the first element metadata

      The others are made up of the dicitionary key and the relative value (we dont have an alias, so instead we use the same name as the sourcefield)

      Returns:
      list of MetaDataDto
